snippet.title: E-Genes - Funtball (TRAILER)
snippet.description:
E-Genes - Funtball is a soccer/football game inspired in Worms and NES world cup.

The game is turn based and real time.

When a player catches the ball the game pauses, the player then chose the kick (skill), horizontal force, vertical force and the kick angle.
Once the ball is kicked the game unpauses.

You can damage and heals the players using skills. Damaged players move lots slower.

#gaming #games #sports #soccer #football #itchio #indiegame #gamedev #game #futebol
